name: VoiceMutedAnnouncer
author: NR
description: When the user switches between muted and unmuted the plugin will announce the currently set mode via audio notification.

changelog.title: Bug Fixes
items: 0.0.2: Added a streamer mode respecting setting.
0.0.4: Added an option to use female voice.

settings.name: Voice notification volume
settings.note: Adjust the volume of the audio notifications.

settings.name: Respect Streamer Mode's disable sounds setting
settings.note: If enabled VoiceMutedAnnouncer will only make an announcement if "Streamer Mode" is disabled or if "Disable sounds" is set to false in "Streamer Mode" settings.

settings.name: Use female voice
settings.note: If enabled female voice is used for the announcements.
